articles.title: Tiafoe into all-American US Open semi vs. Fritz - ESPN
articles.description: Frances Tiafoe reached the US Open semifinals for the second time in three years when his quarterfinal opponent, Grigor Dimitrov, stopped playing because of an injury in the fourth set Tuesday night.
articles.content: NEW YORK -- Frances Tiafoe and Taylor Fritz set up an all-American semifinal at the US Open with victories Tuesday, guaranteeing the host country a men's finalist in its Grand Slam tournament for the… [+2169 chars]

articles.title: US charges Hamas leadership over 7 October attack on Israel - BBC.com
articles.description: Six top members of Hamas are charged with crimes including the murder of Americans and terrorism.
articles.content:
The US has charged Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar and several other prominent figures in the Palestinian group in connection with its deadly attack in Israel on 7 October last year.

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccines, once free, are now pricey for uninsured people - The Washington Post
articles.description: The elimination of the Bridge Access Program means some low-income Americans must pay up to $200 for an updated shot.
articles.content:
As updated coronavirus vaccines hit U.S. pharmacy shelves, adults without health insurance are discovering the shots are no longer free, instead costing up to $200.
